title: The Demon King From Another World Likes to Tease His Childhood Friend (the hero) Because He’s in Love With Him ~The Demon King, Who Has Already Been Defeated, is Being Doted on by His Childhood Friend, the Hero~ - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Yaoi
tags: Cute Story   Demon Lord   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy World   Former Hero   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Reincarnation   Short Story   Sword And Magic   Tsundere
author: ラズベリーパイ
description:
I, Ishigaki Kurousagi, was the Demon King in another world. My childhood friend, Minuzaki Rei, who was a hero in another world, has already confessed to me and had a relationship with me. However, I don’t remember any of this at all. So… I decided to have him confess again to me in this world.

I hope you enjoy this one-sided romantic comedy and contemporary fantasy with the cool, tsundere hero[Kurousagi], who teases his childhood friend while confessing his love in his heart.>
